body: I don't understand the need to make this pure virtual... just keep it virtual and have RandomInputStream override with a more efficient implementation. Then you don't have to copy the implementations in the other subclasses.
body_html: I don't understand the need to make this pure virtual... just keep it virtual and have RandomInputStream override with a more efficient implementation. Then you don't have to copy the implementations in the other subclasses.
